comments:
If you change version typing it using keyboard exceptions will fall to log.
Under SUSE Linux as I can see it falls even while changing using mouse.

Under Red Hat also you'll get such exception even changing using mouse.
Under windows problems appears not so often, because it's appears only if using keyboard, but under Linux it falls everytime so I think it'll better to fix it in 1.0.1 if it possible.
03/09 status meeting - Naci, this is currently tagged as a hot bug, any update on this issue? Thanks.
Update all 1.5 hot bugs to use the new hot bug process.
